SEARCH
Package model

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
model.Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
FixedEntity, MovingEntity
public abstract class Entity extends Observable
abstract class that represents a generic entity in the game

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private int
    i
    i,j are the coordinates of the entity in the level, they are used to represent the actual position of the entity in the logical scheme of the level and to check for example if two entities collided
    private int
    j
    i,j are the coordinates of the entity in the level, they are used to represent the actual position of the entity in the logical scheme of the level and to check for example if two entities collided

      private int i
